revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #57 Rowap |image = [[File:Rowap.png]] |caption = In days of old, people worked the top-shaped pieces of this Berry free and used them as toys. |growtime = 5h 54m 0s |harvest = 1 berry |replant = 5% |points = 2,900 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *40 sour }} '''Rowap''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 600 points of sour on the field. The [[Belue]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-5760s || 5760-9000s || 9000-14040s || 14040-21240s || 21240-42480s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:RowapTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:RowapTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:RowapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Rowap berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[Belue]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Belue]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Belue]] || style="width: 40px;" | [[Belue]] |- | || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] |- style="height: 26px;" | || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] |- | || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] |- | || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] || [[Belue]] |}
